name: Dynasty of the Magi -  MMO and eBook in one!
blurb: Fantasy e-book series integrated in a MMO. Players compete on quests from the book, for good or evil, the results crafted in next book.

rewards.reward:
Magi Third Eye Open!  Mystic Sight! 
Thank you for backing us! Open your eyes to magic and receive 25 Power Glyphs (Spell and Power Glyphs that operate as the currency of the game—with 25 POWER Glyphs you can increase the power of one skill or power) for use in the 3-D MMO!  (e-Award)

+ Exclusive Kickerstarter Hieroglyph title to add to your characters name in the MMO Game! (e-Award)

MAGI TEAM up! 

Previous tier e-Award

+ 75 more POWER Glyphs & 15 SPELL Glyphs—a Total of 100 Power & 15 Spell Glyphs (Use your spell glyphs to acquire a new spell or skill.  Keep all the glyphs or Open a friend’s eyes to magic with gifts of 25 power glyphs (your previous tier award) to team up and change the Mystic Realms Continuous!
(e-Award)

EURDITE MAGI AWARD!  Unlock the epic fantasy novel Rites of Passage, the unique 3-D interactive novel integrated with the MMO, Words of Power!  This package also includes The Codex of the Magi 

+ 75 more Power Glyphs & 5 Spell Glyphs.  Write your Spell Book!

+ the upgraded Kickstarter “Wise” Heiroglyph title to add to your character's name in the MMO. Show off your knowledge of the Mystic Realms Continuous

+  Previous tier e-Award.

MAGI POSSE!   100 more Power Glyphs & 15 more Spell Glyphs 

+ Rites of Passage Book Cover Poster (physical award)

+ Previous tier e-Award

Total: Three separate Power and Spell Glyph awards—use them all to grow your personal power or POSSE up with some friends and regulate the Mystic Realms Continuous! 

e-Award

NZOMBIE  POWER Mutha Dearest Award—

+ Access to exclusive Kickstarter Spells!  Initially only available to Kickstarter backers! (e-award)

+ Nzombie Trading Card with a Third Eye Open scratch off award.  (Physical Award + 25 power 5 spell glyphs scratch off award) 
+ Previous tier Magi Posse Award
 
 ... trouble is brewing.
SPHINX Award\u2014Magi Words of Power Sphinx Trading card ( 250 power 50 spell glyphs AWARD) \r\n\r\n+ NZOMBIE POWER tier e-Award

SIGNED BOOK OR POSTER ADD ON: Pledge Additional $100 

Choose the Hardcover novel, Paperback novel, or any Poster and get it signed by the author and artist!  keep it or  add it to any tier!

Available Poster designs: Sphinx, NZombie, Ma’at, Lucet, Book Cover (1), Book Cover (2) Book Map, MMO Map, DYNASTY OF THE MAGI Pyramids!

MA'AT  Card—Show your enemies the TRUTH

Magi Words of Power limited-edition artwork Card
750 power 125 spell glyphs + eBook scratch off award!  Yes it's true! That's 2 Rites of Passage eBooks. One for gifting! Give you friend the Erudite Magi e-book award, because you know the truth!
   
+ Sphinx tier e-Award

LUCET Ultimate Power—The LUCET (never say his name) Words of Power limited-edition artwork card  (2000 Power 300 spell glyphs + eBook! Scratch off award!) Give a friend the gift of power!


Build your order—Enough Power and Spell Glyphs to lead an order.

+ MA'AT  + SPHINX + NZOMBIE Cards

This is the Complete Set of Lucet, Ma’at, Sphinx, and Nzombie card with their respective Power Awards. Enough to build an Magi Order in the game for award to your friends. 

+ VIP Glyph to add to your title!

+ Previous tier e-Award

The First Edition Paperback volume of Rites of Passage

+ Book Map Poster

+ MMO Word Poster

+ Lucet Tier award

The First Edition Hardcover volume of Rites of Passage. 

+ Book Map Poster

+ MMO World mapPoster

+Add a Poster

+ Previous tier award

The Signed POSTER & First Edition Hardcover BOOK Package!  

Receive a First Edition Hardcover volume of Rites of Passage 

+ Book Map Poster signed by the artist

+ MMO World Poster signed by the artist

+ LUCET Ultimate Power Award Tier

+ Add a signed Poster by the artist

+ Special Thanks in Game Credits.

The MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package!

+ Rites of Passage  Front Cover Poster signed by artist and Garvan Wolfe
+ Rites of Passage Back Cover Poster (MMO World) signed by artist, Garvan Wolfe, and the whole design team!
+ First Edition signed Hardcover volume of Rites of Passage signed by Garvan Wolfe!
+ Book Map Poster signed by the artist
+ VIP thanks on the Wall of Glyphs with your name in a Cartouche and in Hieroglyphs.
+ Personnel Phone Call from the Author and Creator

NAME EXCLUSIVE KICKSTART SPELLS & POWER GLYPHS!
Have the Exclusive Kickstarter spell—written into the Spell & Skill lore of the world—named after your character, or have the spell named after you.   Only Kickstart backers will be able to unlock the Spell or Power initially!
+ Your name etched in Glyphs on the Pyramid
+ 10 Unlocks to give to your friends
+ MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package

MAKE ME IMMORTAL!

The MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package

+ Personalize your own special NPC for the game—Have a citizen, Cursed or Uncursed, in the game world look like you! Work with the design team to personalize an NPC in the Game and ..see your characters walking around in the MMO.

+ Have your Character entered in the Codex of the Magi and appear in the Novel Series.

+ Poster of your NPC signed by the design team and Garvan Wolfe

+ Your Name etched in Glyphs in Pyramid

NECROMANCER!
Design an Under World Monster! Add to the Necromatic Tomb!

Help design a monster from the Under World … or an Outer World fantastic creature … for you in the game!

+ Receive a signed poster of the monster by the design team

+ See your monster written into the Codex of the Magi in the book of the DYNASTY OF THE MAGI

+ Personal phone call of thanks from the head of the design team and the author/creator Garvan Wolfe 

+ Picture of You with your creature by our artist

+ Your Name etched in Glyphs in Pyramid
+ The MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package

UNDER WORLD ROYALTY!  
Design a Royal Power Player—one available for each of the twelve kingdoms of the Under World. Place cowardice in the heart of Magi, and bring a power to Waking World that is to be feared.  
Your character will have its own history tied to the Outer World or Under Wold and be written into the storyline. 
Work with one of PoetCode’s lead artists to design this fearsome foe, and design the game quest in which players fight for or against your Royal Power Player.  See the results of those quests shape the fate of your character in the next book in the DYNASTY OF MAGI series. 
+ The MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package
+ Your Name etched in Glyphs on the Pyramid

DA Boss

Come to NEW YORK CITY  (airfare and accommodations not included) and meet the design team and Garvan Wolfe! … Or work remotely …

+ Help the design team build a Boss for the game Words of Power. This creature is an agent directly representing one of the twelve kingdoms of the Under World or the twelve fallen Magic Kingdoms.

+ Design quests for your character in MMO

+ See the results of those quest shape that character’s role in the next volume of the DYNASTY OF THE MAGI by Garvan Wolfe

+ Personal custom painting by our artists Mshindo or Justin of you and your Boss

+ The MAGI UBER COLLECTORS Package

+ Personal phone call of thanks from the head of the design team and the author/creator Garvan Wolfe

+ Your Name etched in Glyphs in Pyramid
